item.title: Wildfires Break Out in North and South Carolina, Prompting Evacuations
item.description: The blazes were fueled by gusty winds, dry air and unusually high temperatures. The largest fire was burning 1,600 acres near Myrtle Beach.

item.title: Cuomo’s First Mayoral Campaign Promise: A Plan to Tackle Affordability
item.description: Former Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo has jumped into the New York City mayoral race. His first proposal focuses on affordability.
